mapper.insert: insert into tb_alarm (user_seq, character_seq, alarm_type, alarm_text, relation_tb, target_seq. alarm_is_read, alarm_date) values (#{userSeq}, #{characterSeq}, #{alarmType}, #{alarmText}, #{relationTb}, #{targetSeq}, 0, now())
mapper.select: select alarm_seq, user_seq, character_seq, alarm_type, alarm_text, relation_tb, target_seq. alarm_is_read, alarm_date from tb_alarm where alarm_seq=#{alarmSeq}
select alarm_seq, user_seq, character_seq, alarm_type, alarm_text, relation_tb, target_seq. alarm_is_read, alarm_date from tb_alarm where character_seq=#{characterSeq}
